alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 18 at 1:30PM MST until December 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE..The Arco Desert and Mud Lake area, Craters of the Moon National Monument, and the Big Lost highlands and Copper Basin. This includes most of the Idaho National Laboratory property. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. Frostbite and frozen flesh can happen within 30 minutes if not covered. Messick
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin
